discussion.p: Unlike other operators, `constant_wrapper`'s pseudo-mutators only require that the wrapped type has corresponding mutators, but do not require them to be constexpr or to return a sensible value. This inconsistency loses the SFINAE friendliness (demo):
Since these pseudo-mutators have constraints, it is reasonable to further require constant expressions.
